answers.answer: Take your blood pressure again when you are well rested and its considered high at 140+/ 90+ anything lower than that its normal.

Yea she's right... Try relaxing... like take a cool shower or try sipping on ice water and put your feet up. I had preeclampsia my pressure was 162/60 I had to get emergency C-section. So try your best to relax ok =)

Its still high and I called the on call nurse they said they are more worried about the bottom number so since it wasn't 90 or over ill be ok. I may go in tomorrow just to get checked out. Ive been in a huge amount of pain so I think that may be why is on the higher side. Baby is sitting on a nerve and it causing my back to spasm and my hips have been killing me as well. Oh the joys of late pregnancy. Thanks for the advice!

question: Should I call my OB my blood pressure is 145/85?
title: High blood.pressure
